quote_last: , and was about to enter the code when Collins calmly entered the room, dressed in a tailcoat, striped trousers, stiff white collar and grey silk tie.
title: Over My Dead Body
author: Jeffrey Archer

quote_first: When Jeremy and Cuby reached their room it was
quote_last: . The fire had nearly gone out in their bedroom, but Jeremy went downstairs and brought up more faggots to set it to a new blaze.
title: The Twisted Sword
author: Winston Graham
